items.content_html: Easy-Docs is a lightweight and intuitive real-time collaborative text editor designed for seamless document creation and editing. Built with modern web technologies, it enables multiple users to collaborate simultaneously with live updates. Documents are securely stored in the cloud, ensuring accessibility and persistence across sessions.

Documents are securely stored in the cloud, ensuring accessibility and persistence across sessions.

items.content_html: A lightweight text generation app using React, TypeScript, and Vite on the client side, paired with an Express server leveraging OpenAI API for GPT-4o-mini responses. Features include seamless user interaction, Axios-based communication, and an efficient proxy setup with CORS support for smooth client-server integration.
items.title: Ashe3/open-ai-text-generator: A lightweight text generation app using React, TypeScript, and Vite on the client side, paired with an Express server leveraging OpenAI API for GPT-4o-mini responses. Features include seamless user interaction, Axios-based communication, and an efficient proxy setup with CORS support for smooth client-server integration.
